thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 30 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Inogen Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.48

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Inogen Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.48
text:
April 30 (Reuters) - Inogen Inc:
* INOGEN ANNOUNCES RECORD FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND INCREASES 2018 GUIDANCE
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.48 * Q1 REVENUE $79.1 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $63.9 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.29 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 24.3 TO 28.3 PERCENT * INCREASING ITS FULL YEAR 2018 GAAP NET INCOME AND NON-GAAP NET INCOME GUIDANCE RANGE TO $38 TO $41 MILLION, UP FROM $36 TO $39 MILLION
* INCREASING ITS GUIDANCE RANGE FOR FULL YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA TO $62 TO $67 MILLION, UP FROM $60 TO $64 MILLION
* EXPECTS NET POSITIVE CASH FLOW FOR 2018 WITH NO ADDITIONAL EQUITY CAPITAL REQUIRED TO MEET ITS CURRENT OPERATING PLAN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
